Initializer# init(format:locale:timeZone:calendar:)

iOS 15.0+iPadOS 15.0+Mac Catalyst 15.0+macOS 12.0+tvOS 15.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 8.0+

```
init(
    format: Date.FormatString,
    locale: Locale? = nil,
    timeZone: TimeZone,
    calendar: Calendar
)
```
